product_name: Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Stretch Boxer Briefs - Men's
long_description: Designed for muscle-powered adventures, the men's Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Stretch boxer briefs offer enduring comfort and high performance with very lightweight, odor-resistant fabric. Stretchy, quick drying and moisture wicking, the polyester and spandex fabric offers very light insulation. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays, and fabric treatment helps deter odors. Tagless, brushed elastic waistband and durable, smooth jersey face are soft and comfortable against your skin. Offset seams enhance mobility without chafing. Functional fly. The men's Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Stretch boxer briefs feature a slim fit.
short_description: Designed for muscle-powered adventures, the men's Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Stretch boxer briefs offer enduring comfort and high performance with very lightweight, odor-resistant fabric.
